name: directoryList
syntax: directoryList(path [, recurse] [, returnType] [, filter] [, sort] [, type])
description: Lists the directory and returns the list of files under it as array or query

params.name: listInfo
params.description:
• name: returns an array of names of files and directories
  • path: returns an array of paths of files and directories
  • query: returns a query

params.name: filter
params.description: File extension filter applied to returned names, for example, *.cfm. Multiple filters can be applied by using a pipe delimiter. For example: *.beer|*.cookies

params.name: sort
params.description: Query columns by which to sort. e.g. 'directory ASC, size DESC, datelastmodified'

params.name: type
params.description:
• file: includes only filenames
  • dir: includes only directory names
  • all: includes both filenames and directory names
Adobe CF only

examples.title: Tag Syntax
examples.code:
<cfset listDirectory = "someDirPath" /> 
 <cfset recurse = true /> 
 <cfset listInfo = "name" /> 
 <cfset filter = "someFilter" /> 
 <cfset res= directoryList(listDirectory,recurse,listInfo,filter)>
